alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lancaster; Lebanon; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 21 at 12:27PM EDT until July 21 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Maximum heat index values between 100 to 104 expected. * WHERE...Lebanon, Dauphin, York and Lancaster Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Excessive heat can be life-threatening particularly among at-risk populations, such as children, the elderly, and those with pre-existing health conditions. The hot and humid pattern will continue through the weekend.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay out of the sun, and stay in an air-conditioned room. Check up on relatives and neighbors, and provide pets with adequate water and shelter from the sun. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. For more heat safety information, visit weather.gov/safety/heat.
